definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: It is celebrated on the fifteenth day of the first month of the lunar year.
sentences.chinese: 通常在阴历年的第一个月的第十五天庆祝。

sentences.english: They often find stories by looking at changes in income or spending from year to year.
sentences.chinese: 他们经常可以通过查看历年的收支变化而发现新闻。

sentences.english: All sorts of seamless steel tube production and the highest are over.
sentences.chinese: 各种无缝钢管产销量均创历年来的同期最高。

sentences.english: The funding crunch contributed to the rapid consolidation of the industry over the years.
sentences.chinese: 资金的萎缩导致了历年来的快速产业整合。

sentences.english: This year I seem to have been involved in more recruitment than I can remember for a few years.
sentences.chinese: 今年我参与过的招聘似乎比历年来的都要多。

sentences.english: This file is the calendar year, National Computer Grade 4 examination papers.
sentences.chinese: 此文件是历年全国计算机4级等级考试试题。

sentences.english: Chinese New Year Eve chanting, praying for longevity, Lion dance, tea party.
sentences.chinese: 农历年除夕延生法会，舞狮，茶叙。

sentences.english: It's at the end of January or the beginning of February. It marks the beginning of the lunar year.
sentences.chinese: 春节在一月份或二月初，标志着农历年的开始。

sentences.english: And list the Crodyceps having been discovered in this area during the past years.
sentences.chinese: 并列出了历年来滇黔桂喀斯特地区发现的虫草菌。

sentences.english: Over the years, products are sold well in China, the Southeast Asia, Europe and America.
sentences.chinese: 历年来，产品畅销中国各地及东南亚和欧美地区。

sentences.english: The accumulated soda waste by the Tianjin Soda Factory only has taken places up to several square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 仅天津碱厂历年堆积的碱渣占地已达数平方公里。

sentences.english: Results The salt-iodine concentration in the residents of Hunan Province tended to decrease year by year.
sentences.chinese: 结果湖南省居民户食盐碘含量呈历年降低趋势。

sentences.english: On the last day of the lunar year, there is a big familydinner。
sentences.chinese: 阴历年的最后一天，通常要吃一顿丰盛的团圆饭。

sentences.english: Over the years, we are intent on the creativity and the study of sculpture art.
sentences.chinese: 历年来，广州雕塑院始终专注于雕塑的创作和研究。

sentences.english: What awards has the studio received over the years?
sentences.chinese: 工作室历年所获的奖项都有哪些？

sentences.english: Jiaxing was on the top of the amount of livestock and poultry excrements.
sentences.chinese: 各地中嘉兴的畜禽粪便产生量历年最大。

definition: the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
